DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine 2-week repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation subacute phase stroke ( day 7 day 14 ) improve significantly arm motility 3 month remain effect one year , without significant adverse effect .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Long-term Effectiveness High Frequency Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Stroke ( RAICup )
DOC.detailed_description: Stroke survivor may leave disability involve speech residual arm leg weakness . Despite spontaneous improvement week follow stroke , importance final disability unpredictable . If core infarct represent dead neuron , neuron adjacent area seem stagger lack excitability correlate bad prognosis . Repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) seem promise technique since high frequency rTMS increase excitability target neuron . The aim study evaluate 2 week 20 min rTMS day : 1 ) improvement arm function neurological disability scale , immediately 2-week session , one month , 3 month evaluate remnant effect 12 month , 2 ) correlate scale physiological parameter order assess clinical modification electrophysiological modification , 3 ) assert safety high frequency rTMS subacute phase ischaemic stroke .
DOC.criteria: Single mono hemispheric subcortical and/or cortical ischaemic stroke ( document CT MRI ) 7 21 day , moderate arm paresis define Rankin score < = 4 4 ( paragraph 5 NIHSS ) , territory middle cerebral artery Patients 18 80 year old severe peripheral neuropathy pacemaker , implant medical pump , metal plate , metal object skull eye History previous stroke , epileptic seizure , craniotomy , brain trauma Score Rankin > 4 arm deficit 4 ( paragraph 5 NIHSS ) Score Rankin < =1 Cortical stroke Alertness problem time inclusion Disability previous stroke Stenosis internal carotid artery surgery foreseen within 3 month Uncontrolled medical problem Not able give inform consent Pregnant breastfeeding woman
